title: Mauricio Pochettino - Wikipedia
snippet: On 5 July 2022, it was announced that Paris Saint-Germain had parted ways with Pochettino. On 29 May 2023, it was announced Pochettino would be appointed as head coach of Chelsea on 1 July 2023, on a two-year contract with an option to extend for another year.
